name: kustomize-navigator
description: Navigate between Kustomize YAML files with ctrl+click

kustomizeNavigator.highlightFluxVariable.description: Highlight Flux variable substitutions in YAML files

kustomizeNavigator.fluxVariableColor.description: Color to use for highlighting Flux variables

kustomizeNavigator.standardFluxVariables.description: List of standard Flux variables to suggest in autocompletion

kustomizeNavigator.diagnostics.enabled.description: Master toggle for all diagnostic checks

kustomizeNavigator.diagnostics.checks.re.description: Check if resource names follow Kubernetes naming conventions

kustomizeNavigator.diagnostics.checks.na.description: Check if namespaced resources have a namespace specified

kustomizeNavigator.diagnostics.checks.re.description: Check for recursive dependencies in Flux kustomizations

kustomizeNavigator.diagnostics.checks.im.description: Check for hardcoded image tags or missing tags

kustomizeNavigator.diagnostics.checks.se.description: Check for common security issues like privileged containers

kustomizeNavigator.diagnostics.checks.fl.description: Check for deprecated Flux API versions

kustomizeNavigator.diagnostics.checks.gi.description: Check if essential GitOps components are present

kustomizeNavigator.diagnostics.checks.pe.description: Check for configurations that might cause performance issues

kustomizeNavigator.diagnostics.checks.va.description: Check for Flux variable substitution issues

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
